entity.name: Work_order
entity.description:
A Work_order describes how a request for work is addressed and carried out The Work_order may or may not ever actually be incorporated, depending upon the level of authorization granted to it.
Every Work_order consists of a work directive in response to a Work_request, and a directed activity that defines the work to be done. This
Work_definition
represents the main
Activity
that has to be carried out as part of the Work_order.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: specifies additional information about the Work_order.

explicit.name: directed_activity
explicit.description: The activities that are directed by the Work_order.

explicit.name: in_response_to
explicit.description: specifies the Work_request(s) that are addressed by the Work_order.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: the identification used to refer to the Work_order, unique in conjunction with the in_response_to Work_requests.

derived.name: choosen_method
derived.description: Description of the method adopted as solutions by the selected by the Work_order.

derived.name: status
derived.description: a user interpretable designation for the level of completion of the Work_order.
